room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Rush To Escape in Las Vegas
review: This was my (our) first escape (Prison Break) and it was an absolute blast! Dan was so nice and gave awesome clues when needed - just enough to point the general way, but still left it to the players to figure it out. Our group’s age range went from 9 to over 50, and everyone stayed joyfully engaged and entertained. I will be recommending Rush to Escape to all my friends! Can’t wait to go back and try Sherlock.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Rush To Escape in Las Vegas
review: Really enjoyed the Prison escape. Looking forward to going back for Sherlock. Very entertaining and challenging for grandparents and grandkids alike. Owner is very helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Rush To Escape in Las Vegas
review: Just escaped from prison and it was such a fun experience! I've done many and this is the best one I've done, and easily the best one in Vegas. So inventive and really fun surprises. Gotta try it! Can't wait to do all their rooms. Plus the owners really have a passion for this and are very friendly and helpful. Love this place!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Rush To Escape in Las Vegas
review: Did both of the rooms with my wife and in-laws. A great bonding experience, tricky puzzles and great atmosphere. They also welcomed our little ones with open arms. A lot of work behind it - that's clear. Can't wait for more rooms to open.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Rush To Escape in Las Vegas
review: Me and my friends did the Prison Break room. It was so unique, the decorations really help convey the story! I recommend Rush to Escape for everyone looking to have fun!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Rush To Escape in Las Vegas
review: Loved the escape from prison! I've done a lot of rooms in the area, and this one is definitely at the top of my list! Keeps you guessing. The owners were great and very welcoming. I'll be back (like the terminator!!!)
